verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> If a woman כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תַזְרִ֔יעַ <WH2232> have conceived seed וְיָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> and born זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> a man child וְטָֽמְאָה֙ <WH2930> then she shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days כִּימֵ֛י <WH3117> according to the days נִדַּ֥ת <WH5079> of the separation דְּוֹתָ֖הּ <WH1738> for her infirmity תִּטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> shall she be unclean
וּבַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <WH8066> And in the eighth יִמּ֖וֹל <WH4135> shall be circumcised בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> the flesh עָרְלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6190> of his foreskin

וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> the days תֵּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> And she shall then continue בִּדְמֵ֣י <WH1818> in the blood טָהֳרָ֑ה <WH2893> of her purifying בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> no hallowed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִגָּ֗ע <WH5060> she shall touch וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <WH4720> into the sanctuary לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תָבֹ֔א <WH935> thing nor come עַד־ <WH5704> until מְלֹ֖את <WH4390> be fulfilled יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> the days טָהֳרָֽהּ׃ <WH2893> of purification

וְאִם־ <WH518> if נְקֵבָ֣ה <WH5347> a maid child תֵלֵ֔ד <WH3205> But if she bear וְטָמְאָ֥ה <WH2930> then she shall be unclean שְׁבֻעַ֖יִם <WH7620> two weeks כְּנִדָּתָ֑הּ <WH5079> as in her separation וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days וְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> and six יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days תֵּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> and she shall continue עַל־ <WH5921> in דְּמֵ֥י <WH1818> in the blood טָהֳרָֽה׃ <WH2893> of her purifying

וּבִמְלֹ֣את ׀ <WH4390> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> And when the days טָהֳרָ֗הּ <WH2893> is cleansed לְבֵן֮ <WH1121> for a son א֣וֹ <WH176> or לְבַת֒ <WH1323> or for a daughter תָּבִ֞יא <WH935> she shall bring כֶּ֤בֶשׂ <WH3532> a lamb בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שְׁנָתוֹ֙ <WH8141> year לְעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and a young יוֹנָ֥ה <WH3123> pigeon אוֹ־ <WH176> or תֹ֖ר <WH8449> or a turtledove לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְהִקְרִיב֞וֹ <WH7126> Who shall offer לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> it before יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> and make an atonement עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וְטָהֲרָ֖ה <WH2891> for her and she shall be cleansed מִמְּקֹ֣ר <WH4726> from the issue דָּמֶ֑יהָ <WH1818> of her blood זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַת֙ <WH8451> This [is] the law הַיֹּלֶ֔דֶת <WH3205> for her that hath born לַזָּכָ֖ר <WH2145> a male א֥וֹ <WH176> or לַנְּקֵבָֽה׃ <WH5347> or a female

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> cannot תִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> be able יָדָהּ֮ <WH3027> able דֵּ֣י <WH1767> able שֶׂה֒ <WH7716> a lamb וְלָקְחָ֣ה <WH3947> then she shall bring שְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH8147> two תֹרִ֗ים <WH8449> turtles א֤וֹ <WH176> or שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> two בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> or two young יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3123> pigeons אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> the one לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for the burnt offering וְאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> and the other לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> and הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest וְטָהֵֽרָה׃ <WH2891> for her and she shall be clean פ
